info.title: Moon
info.description:
MOON - API
v1.5.6
URL: http://api.burningsoul.in/moon
OUTPUT: JSON
INPUT : Time stamp / null(nill) for current data
Moon API returns current status of moon along with distance,full moon , new moon.


Example output
{"age":16.7517888165,"illumination":95.5999740427, "stage":"waning","DFCOE":395582.13,"DFS":149728726.73,"FM":{"UT":1428149241.34,"DT":"12:07:21-4 Apr 2015"}, "NNM":{"UT":1429383559.94,"DT":"18:59:19-18 Apr 2015"}}
Structure

age : current age of moon in days 
illumination : illumination (in %) 
stage : current moon phase stage (waning/waxing) 
DFCOE : distance from core of earth 
DFS : distance from sun 
FM->UT: full moon unix time stamp 
FM->DT: full moon date and time 
NNM->UT: new moon unix time stamp 
NNM->DT: new moon date and time 

Usage
Getting info by time In order to get info by time you have to pass the unix time stamp to URL URL : http://api.burningsoul.in/moon/{timestamp} EX:- http://api.burningsoul.in/moon/1428336623
jQuery
$.getJSON('http://api.burningsoul.in/moon',function(data){ // do something with "data" });
PHP
$moonData=get_file_contents('http://api.burningsoul.in/moon');
Using API client
$API=new Burningsoul_API(); $data=$API->moon();
